unnormalised: Specifically, let's look at how it affects us back here in India. Whether it's football, cricket, or even Kabaddi, transfer season is a time for fervent speculation and heated chai-stall debates. "Will Sunil Chhetri move back to Bengaluru FC?" "Is Mumbai City FC going to splash the cash on another foreign striker?" These are the questions keeping us up at night.
